_welcome_message_: ${sender} has invited you to join the ${project_name} project on ${host}. Use the button to accept the invitation, or accept the invitation from the Notifications menu next time you log in.
_you_have_been_invited_: You have been invited to a project
_join_recogito_message_: You have been invited to join other users on ${instance_name}. Use the button below to accept the invitation and set your credentials.  We look forward to seeing you there!
